title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Hezbollah Targets in Lebanon: Inside the Combat Aircraft and Artillery Attacks”

content.rendered:
IDF spokesperson:

Military buildings, a military post and terrorist infrastructures; the IDF attacked several targets in Lebanese territory.

Earlier today, the IDF attacked a series of targets of the Hezbollah terrorist organization in Lebanese territory by means of combat aircraft and artillery fire. Among the targets struck were military buildings, a military post, and the organization’s terror infrastructures. In addition, the IDF attacked several areas in Lebanese territory with artillery fire.

Following the recent warnings in the areas of Kiryat Shmona and Margaliot, about 10 launches were identified from Lebanese territory, three of which were intercepted.

In addition, several launches were identified today towards Israeli territory, the IDF attacked the shooting sources.

Attached is documentation of the attacks: https://bit.ly/3SdqAHj
